round_best: Develop a multi-agent reinforcement learning framework that leverages environmental affordances as indirect communication channels. In this system, agents can manipulate elements of the environment (e.g., changing light levels, altering object positions) to signal intent or state changes to other agents without traditional messaging systems. This method builds upon existing concepts in embodied cognition, enabling agents to communicate more robustly and effectively in complex scenarios by utilizing the physical context itself as a form of communication.
